Summary: Distant silver glint for a few seconds and then gone.
divs: Sighting DetailsI was standing outside talking to some family members and I looked up and saw a distant silver glint in the south-western sky. At first I thought it was a plane at first but then I noticed that it was round shaped. I looked at it for about 30 seconds and turned back around so I could point out the object. When I looked back up, it was completely gone. There was no way an aircraft could travel that fast because I had a very wide range of view and was only turned away for a few seconds.
trends: There have been 12 other sightings in St Charles
There were no other sightings in St Charles on or around August 16th 2008
